import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './sign.css'; const Sign = () => { const [username,setUsername]=useState('') const [password,setpassword]=useState('') function handleChange() { const obj = { username: username, password: password }; const dataStored = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('newUser')) || []; const updatedData = [...dataStored, obj]; localStorage.setItem('newUser', JSON.stringify(updatedData)); } return (
@ setUsername(e.target.value)} required />
